pageDescription: The Ladies Section has around 40 members and, like the Ladies Section, competes in local and national Association competitions. Competitive matches are played on weekday afternoons, with mixed competitions alongside the Ladies Section at weekends. In winter, the Ladies also enjoy short carpet competitions on weekday afternoons. The current Ladies outdoor champion is Irene McCready, who sadly passed away recently.
